roleset.name: full of mucin
roleset.note: MUCINOUS-J NOTES: Based on instances in Thyme. Framed by Claire. Mucin is: any group of glycoproteins found especially in the secretions of mucous membranes. (from mucinous.01-j)

role.descr: thing that is full of mucin

example.name: Thyme example
example.text: The largest lymph node is mucinous .
